Pre-Game Insights: Bradley Blalock is set to start for the Colorado Rockies against Jesus Sanchez and the Miami Marlins.
The Rockies pitching staff is last in the majors with a collective seven strikeouts per nine innings.
Marlins pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.73 this year, which ranks 28th in MLB.
The game is scheduled to start at 3:10 p.m. ET at Coors Field.
The Rockies are favored with odds of -138, while the Marlins are underdogs with odds of +117.
